Title: Relates to the appointment of the state inspector general and the officials the state inspector general reports to
Summary: Requires the state inspector general be appointed by agreement of the governor, the speaker of the assembly and the temporary president of the senate; requires the state inspector general to report to the governor, clerk to the speaker of the assembly and the clerk to the temporary president of the senate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the appointment of the state inspector general and the officials the state inspector general reports to
